column4: I am thinking of getting a HP Pavilion laptop ... but I am wondering if the built-in webcam will be working with Ubuntu Hardy!?!? Has anyone here had any experience with this?
yeah, it works.. am using a dv 9734tx
Not among pavillions... and anyways, they all work..!!
just make a backup DVD of the original OS... so that in case of any manufacturing defect, u can keep ur warranty intact... then install ubuntu and rejoice !!
